Package doa.engine.scene

Class DoaObject

java.lang.Object
doa.engine.scene.DoaObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DoaObject extends Object implements Serializable
Blueprint of all objects that are going to be processed by DoaEngine, all objects that will be processed by DoaEngine must either be this class, or its sub-classes.
Since:
DoaEngine 1.0
Version:
3.0
Author:
Doga Oruc
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • DoaObject

      public DoaObject()
      Constructor. Constructs an empty DoaObject.

    • DoaObject

      public DoaObject​(String name)
      Constructor. Constructs an empty DoaObject.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the DoaObject

  • Method Details

    • makeStatic

      public DoaObject makeStatic()
      Makes the DoaObject static. Static DoaObjects are in screen-space. They aren't moved by DoaCamera and aren't shaded by DoaEngine. Particularly useful when implementing UI.
      Returns:
      this

    • makeDynamic

      public DoaObject makeDynamic()
      Makes the DoaObject dynamic. Dynamic DoaObjects are in world-space.
      Returns:
      this

    • isDynamic

      public boolean isDynamic()

    • getScene

      public final DoaScene getScene()
      Returns the scene which this DoaObject is in. Returns null if this DoaObject is not inside a scene.
      Returns:
      the scene which this DoaObject is in, or null if this DoaObject is not inside one

    • getzOrder

      public final int getzOrder()
      Returns the zOrder of this DoaObject. A higher zOrder means the DoaObject is drawn over DoaObjects with lower zOrder values.
      Returns:
      the zOrder of this DoaObject

    • getComponentByType

      public final <T extends DoaComponent> Optional<DoaComponent> getComponentByType​(@NotNull @NotNull Class<T> type)
      Finds and returns the first occurrence of a DoaComponent. This method will log a warning message if a DoaComponent of type T cannot be found.
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of the DoaComponent to find
      Parameters:
      type - class of the DoaComponent to find
      Returns:
      an optional containing either the found DoaComponent or null

    • getComponentsView

      public final List<DoaComponent> getComponentsView()
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the DoaComponents inside this DoaObject.
      Returns:
      an immutable view of DoaComponents

    • setzOrder

      @OverridingMethodsMustInvokeSuper public void setzOrder​(int zOrder)

    • onAddToScene

      @OverridingMethodsMustInvokeSuper public void onAddToScene​(DoaScene scene)

    • onRemoveFromScene

      @OverridingMethodsMustInvokeSuper public void onRemoveFromScene​(DoaScene scene)

    • addComponent

      public final void addComponent​(@NotNull @NotNull DoaComponent component)
      Add the specified DoaComponent to this DoaObject. If the component is already added to another DoaObject, it is first removed from that DoaObject prior.
      Parameters:
      component - the DoaComponent to add

    • removeComponent

      public final void removeComponent​(@NotNull @NotNull DoaComponent component)
      Removes the specified DoaComponent from this DoaObject. This method will log a warning message if component is not present in this DoaObject.
      Parameters:
      component - the DoaComponent to remove
